name: Mango Suites - Isabela
description:
Located in Santiago City, Mango Suites - Isabela offers 2-star accommodations with a terrace. Featuring a garden, the 2-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. Guests can have a drink at the snack bar.

Rooms contain a safety deposit box, while certain rooms come with a balcony and others also feature city views. The rooms in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV and free toiletries.

Breakfast is available each morning, and includes à la carte, continental and American options.
address: City Road, Barangay Calao East, Isabela, 3311 Santiago City, Philippines

name: Mango Suites Cauayan
description:
Mango Suites Cauayan is offering accommodations in Cauayan City. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, free shuttle service and room service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Free private parking is available and the hotel also has car rental for guests who want to explore the surrounding area.

At the hotel, rooms have a closet. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a bidet and free toiletries, all rooms at Mango Suites Cauayan have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and some rooms also feature a terrace. At the accommodation the rooms have bed linen and towels.

Breakfast is available each morning, and includes à la carte, Full English/Irish and American options.

Languages spoken at the 24-hour front desk include English and Filipino.
address: Quezon St. Brgy District 1, 3305 Cauayan City, Philippines

name: RedDoorz Plus at Holiday Plaza Hotel Tuguegarao City
description:
Operating a 24-hour front desk, Holiday Plaza Hotel offers complimentary 2-way shuttle service to and from Tuguegarao Airport, which is within a 15-minute drive away. Free Wi-Fi access is available in the entire property and parking is provided at no charge.

Fitted with tiled flooring, air-conditioned rooms are furnished with a desk, wardrobe, a flat-screen cable TV and seating area. Shower facility and free toiletries are included in the private bathrooms.

Available round-the-clock, the friendly staff at Holiday Plaza Hotel can assist guests with fax/photocopying, ironing and car rental services. Newspapers are provided, while elevator is available for convenience.

The in-house Max's Restaurant serves tasty Filipino cuisine, while Levie De Caffe offers a selection of local dishes and beverages. Meals can also be served in the privacy of guests’ rooms.

This nonsmoking hotel is about a 30-minute drive to the popular Callao Cave. Our Lady of Piat Church is approximately a 45-minute drive away. Shuttle services can be arranged upon request.
address: Arellano corner Blumentrit Street, Cagayan, 3500 Tuguegarao City, Philippines

name: Lugano Bed and Breakfast
description:
Lugano Bed and Breakfast offers air-conditioned rooms in Santa Ana. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk, and a shared kitchen, along with free Wifi throughout the property. The rooms include a patio.

At the bed and breakfast, the units include a desk. The rooms come with a private bathroom with a bidet, while selected rooms here will provide you with mountain views. At the bed and breakfast, the units come with bed linen and towels.

Breakfast is available every morning, and includes continental, Asian and vegetarian options. There is a coffee shop and lounge.

Guests can also relax in the garden.
address: San Vicente, Cagayan, 3514 Santa Ana, Philippines

name: The Hotel Andrea
description:
Located in Cauayan City, The Hotel Andrea offers 3-star accommodations with a garden, a terrace and a bar. This 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service. The hotel features an outdoor swimming pool, fitness center, evening entertainment and room service.

Guest rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, an electric tea pot, a bidet, free toiletries and a desk. Each room includes a private bathroom with a shower, while selected rooms contain a kitchenette with a fridge. At the hotel all rooms include a shared bathroom and bed linen.

The daily breakfast offers continental, Full English/Irish or American options. At The Hotel Andrea you'll find a restaurant serving American and Chinese cuisine. Vegetarian and dairy-free options can also be requested.

The accommodation offers 3-star accommodations with a hot tub.
address: Canciller Avenue N/A, 3305 Cauayan City, Philippines

description:
Villa de Babat in Basco provides accommodations with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and a shared lounge. This bed and breakfast offers free private parking and free shuttle service. The accommodation provides luggage storage space, a concierge service, and organizing tours for guests.

At the bed and breakfast, the units include a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, and towels. There's also a well-equipped kitchenette in some units equipped with an oven, a microwave, and a toaster. At the bed and breakfast, some units are soundproof.

Breakfast is available every morning, and includes continental, American and Asian options. Guests may eat at the on-site family-friendly restaurant, which is open for dinner, brunch, cocktails, and high tea.

Guests at the bed and breakfast will be able to enjoy activities in and around Basco, like cycling and hiking. Villa de Babat has both a sun terrace and garden to relax in after a busy day, along with water sports facilities.

description:
Located in Basco, 1.8 miles from Valugan Boulder Beach, Boulder-Bay Residences has accommodations with a garden, free private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. This 3-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The hotel has family rooms.

At the hotel rooms come with air conditioning, a closet, a balcony with a mountain view, a private bathroom, a flat-screen TV, bed linen and towels. At Boulder-Bay Residences, every room includes a seating area.

Guests at the accommodation can enjoy an Asian breakfast.
address: National Road, 3900 Basco, Philippines

name: Evan's Homestay
description:
Evan's Homestay features air-conditioned accommodations in Basco. This homestay offers a garden. The accommodation provides full-day security and daily room service for guests.

Each room includes a kettle, while certain rooms are equipped with a fully equipped kitchen with a fridge, a stovetop, and kitchenware.

A selection of options including warm dishes, fresh pastries, and pancakes are available for breakfast, and breakfast in the room is also available.

You can play darts at the homestay. A baby safety gate is also available at Evan's Homestay, while guests can also relax on the sun terrace.
address: Hordonez Street, 3900 Basco, Philippines

name: Sunset Beach and Family Resort Gonzaga Cagayan
description:
Sunset Beach and Family Resort Gonzaga Cagayan is a 1-star property located in Bawa. This 1-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk. The hotel has family rooms.

The rooms in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV.
address: Sunset Beach and Family Resort, Barangay Ipil, 3513 Bawa, Philippines
